entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
